quotes.Quote_english: Praise be to Allah, the Lord of the Universe
quotes.Quote_arabic: ٱلْحَمْدُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

quotes.Quote_english: Indeed the only guidance is Allah’s Guidance!
quotes.Quote_arabic: قُلۡ اِنَّ هُدَى اللّٰهِ هُوَ الۡهُدٰى

quotes.Quote_english: And declare (O Muhammad) that [the Quran] is a guidance and healing for the believers.
quotes.Quote_arabic: قُلْ هُوَ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا هُدًى وَشِفَاءٌ

quotes.Quote_english: A guidance for mankind and clear evidence and discrimination (between wrong).
quotes.Quote_arabic: هُدًى لِّلنَّاسِ وَ بَيِّنٰتٍ مِّنَ الۡهُدٰى وَالۡفُرۡقَانِۚ

quotes.Quote_english: Guide us to the straight path
quotes.Quote_arabic: ٱهْدِنَا ٱلصِّرَٰطَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ

quotes.Quote_english: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not (the path) of that evoked [You’rer] anger or of those who are astray
quotes.Quote_arabic: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

quotes.Quote_english: And whoever puts all his trust in Allah. He will be enough for him
quotes.Quote_arabic: وَمَنْ يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ

quotes.Quote_english: Then you have taken a decision, put your trust in Allah. Certainly, Allah loves those who put their trust (in Him)
quotes.Quote_arabic: فَاِذَا عَزَمۡتَ فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى اللّٰهِ​ؕ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يُحِبُّ الۡمُتَوَكِّلِيۡنَ

quotes.Quote_english: I will be with those who have patience.
quotes.Quote_arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّبِرِينَ

quotes.Quote_english: So endure patiently, with beautiful patience.
quotes.Quote_arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ صَبْرًا جَمِيلًا

quotes.Quote_english: Be tolerant and command what is right: pay no attention to foolish people.
quotes.Quote_arabic: خُذِ ٱلْعَفْوَ وَأْمُرْ بِٱلْعُرْفِ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْجَهِلِينَ

quotes.Quote_english: Seek forgiveness of your Lord and repent to Him.
quotes.Quote_arabic: وَّاَنِ اسۡتَغۡفِرُوۡا رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوۡبُوۡۤا اِلَيۡه

quotes.Quote_english: Our Lord! Forgive my parents and me, and (all) the believers on the Day when the reckoning will be established
quotes.Quote_arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَاب

quotes.Quote_english: And Allah would not punish them while they seek forgiveness.
quotes.Quote_arabic: وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمْ وَهُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ

quotes.Quote_english: And Allah would not punish them while they seek forgiveness.
quotes.Quote_arabic: وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمْ وَهُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ

quotes.Quote_english: If you would count up the favors of Allah, never would you be able to number them: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
quotes.Quote_arabic: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا۟ نِعْمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَآ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

quotes.Quote_english: And whatever you have of favor, it is from Allah.
quotes.Quote_arabic: وَمَا بِكُمْ مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ فَمِنَ اللَّهِ

quotes.Quote_english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny”
quotes.Quote_arabic: فَبِاَىِّ اٰلَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبٰنِۙ

quotes.Quote_english: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
quotes.Quote_arabic: ا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ

quotes.Quote_english: Behold, all bounty is in the hand of Allah ; He grants it unto whom He wills: for Allah is infinite, all-knowing
quotes.Quote_arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْفَضْلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٌ

quotes.Quote_english: Allah is enough for us; and how excellent a guardian is He!
quotes.Quote_arabic: سْبُنَا ٱللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ ٱلْوَكِيلُ

quotes.Quote_english: And unto everyone who is conscious of Allah , He [always] grants a way out [of unhappiness
quotes.Quote_arabic: مَن كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مَخْرَجًا

quotes.Quote_english: and their Lord gives them the good news of His mercy and pleasure, Gardens where they will have lasting bliss
quotes.Quote_arabic: يُبَشِّرُهُمْ رَبُّهُم بِرَحْمَةٍ مِّنْهُ وَرِضْوَٰنٍ وَجَنَّـٰتٍ لَّهُمْ فِيهَا نَعِيمٌ مُّقِيمٌ

quotes.Quote_english: We cause Our grace to alight upon whomever We will; and We do not fail to requite the doers of good
quotes.Quote_arabic: نُصِيبُ بِرَحْمَتِنَا مَن نَّشَآءُ وَلَا نُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

quotes.Quote_english: As for those who believe and do good, We will certainly absolve them of their sins, and reward them according to the best of what they used to do
quotes.Quote_arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَنُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ وَلَنَجْزِيَنَّهُمْ أَحْسَنَ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

quotes.Quote_english: O people, assuredly Allah’s promise is true. So let the life of the world not delude you, and let not the Deluder delude you concerning Allah
quotes.Quote_arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْغَرُورُ

quotes.Quote_english: and My Mercy encompasses everything
quotes.Quote_arabic: وَرَحْمَتِي وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ

quotes.Quote_english: Still, there are some who take others as Allah’s equal—they love them as they should love Allah—but the believers love Allah even more.
quotes.Quote_arabic: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَن يَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَندَادًا يُحِبُّونَهُمْ كَحُبِّ اللَّهِ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَشَدُّ حُبًّا لِّلَّه

quotes.Quote_english: And if you should count the favours of Allah, you would never be able to number them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful
quotes.Quote_arabic: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا نِعْمَةَ اللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَا ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

quotes.Quote_english: Your spouses are a garment (comfort, chastity, and protection) for you as you are for them
quotes.Quote_arabic: هُنَّ لِبَاسٌ۬ لَّكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ لِبَاسٌ۬ لَّهُنَّ‌

quotes.Quote_english: Whoever ascribes to me what I have not said then let him occupy his seat in Hell-fire!
quotes.Quote_arabic: من قال عليّ ما لم أقل فليتبوأ مقعده من النار

quotes.Quote_english: Whoever treads a path seeking knowledge, Allah will make easy for him the path to Paradise
quotes.Quote_arabic: مَنْ سَلَكَ طَرِيقًا يَلْتَمِسُ فِيهِ عِلْمًا سَهَّلَ اللَّهُ لَهُ طَرِيقًا إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ

quotes.Quote_english: When Allah wishes good for someone, He bestows upon him the understanding of Deen.
quotes.Quote_arabic: من يرد الله به خيرًا يفقه في الدين

quotes.Quote_english: Allah makes the way to Jannah easy for him who treads the path in search of knowledge.
quotes.Quote_arabic: ومن سلك طريقًا يلتمس فيه علما سهل الله له به طريقًا إلى الجنة

quotes.Quote_english: He who goes forth in search of knowledge is considered as struggling in the Cause of Allah until he returns.
quotes.Quote_arabic: من خرج في طلب العلم، فهو في سبيل الله حتى يرجع

quotes.Quote_english: A believer never satisfies doing good until he reaches Jannah.
quotes.Quote_arabic: لن يشبع مؤمن من خير حتى يكون منتهاه الجنة

quotes.Quote_english: Get married, for I am heartened by your great numbers before the nations (of other Prophets).
quotes.Quote_arabic: تَزَوَّجُوا فَإِنِّي مُكَاثِرٌ بِكُمُ الأُمَمَ

quotes.Quote_english: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
quotes.Quote_arabic: لا يُؤمِنُ أحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ

quotes.Quote_english: Actions are judged according to intentions.
quotes.Quote_arabic: إنما الأعمال بالنيات

quotes.Quote_english: The best among you are those who are best to their wives.
quotes.Quote_arabic: خيركم خيركم لأهله، وأنا خيركم لأهلي

quotes.Quote_english: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
quotes.Quote_arabic: لا يؤمن أحدكم حتى يحب لأخيه ما يحب لنفسه

quotes.Quote_english: Modesty is part of faith.
quotes.Quote_arabic: الحياء شعبة من الإيمان

quotes.Quote_english: The seeking of knowledge is obligatory upon every Muslim.
quotes.Quote_arabic: طلب العلم فريضة على كل مسلم

quotes.Quote_english: The best of you are those who are best in conduct.
quotes.Quote_arabic: خيركم خيركم أخلاقا

quotes.Quote_english: The strong man is not the one who is good at wrestling, but the strong man is the one who controls himself in anger.
quotes.Quote_arabic: لَيْسَ الشَّدِيدُ بِالصُّرَعَةِ، إِنَّمَا الشَّدِيدُ الَّذِي يَمْلِكُ نَفْسَهُ عِنْدَ الْغَضَبِ

quotes.Quote_english: Verily, deeds are only with intentions
quotes.Quote_arabic: إنما الأعمال بالنيات

quotes.Quote_english: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
quotes.Quote_arabic: خيركم من تعلم القرآن وعلمه

quotes.Quote_english: The best among you is the one who learns the Quran and teaches it.
quotes.Quote_arabic: خيركم من تعلم القرآن وعلمه

quotes.Quote_english: A good word is charity.
quotes.Quote_arabic: الكلمة الطيبة صدقة

quotes.Quote_english: Allah is kind and loves kindness in all things
quotes.Quote_arabic: إن الله رفيق يحب الرفق في الأمور كلها

quotes.Quote_english: The best supplication is that which is made during the night prayer.
quotes.Quote_arabic: أفضل الدعاء دعاء الليل
